about.summary: Create pretty tables for 'HTML', 'Microsoft Word' and 'Microsoft PowerPoint' documents.  Functions are provided to let users create tables, modify and format their content.  It extends package 'officer' that does not contain any feature for customized tabular reporting  and can be used within R markdown documents.

name: r-flextable
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.5.5' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-flextable
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/flextable_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/flextable/flextable_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b0fb22854bfd8d10ead84a369992e605e7a021b22da8bc96c433be325d4ddde0

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-base64enc
    - r-data.table
    - r-gdtools >=0.1.6
    - r-htmltools
    - r-knitr
    - r-officer >=0.2.0
    - r-rlang
    - r-rmarkdown
    - r-xml2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-base64enc
    - r-data.table
    - r-gdtools >=0.1.6
    - r-htmltools
    - r-knitr
    - r-officer >=0.2.0
    - r-rlang
    - r-rmarkdown
    - r-xml2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('flextable')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('flextable')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://davidgohel.github.io/flextable
  license: GPL-3
  summary: Create pretty tables for 'HTML', 'Microsoft Word' and 'Microsoft PowerPoint' documents.  Functions
    are provided to let users create tables, modify and format their content.  It extends
    package 'officer' that does not contain any feature for customized tabular reporting  and
    can be used within R markdown documents.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: flextable
# Type: Package
# Title: Functions for Tabular Reporting
# Version: 0.5.5
# Authors@R: c( person("David", "Gohel", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "david.gohel@ardata.fr"), person("Quentin", "Fazilleau", role = c("ctb"), email = "quentin.fazilleau@ardata.fr"), person("Maxim", "Nazarov", role = c("ctb"), comment = "rmarkdown for docx output"), person(given = "Titouan", family = "Robert", role = c("ctb")) )
# Description: Create pretty tables for 'HTML', 'Microsoft Word' and 'Microsoft PowerPoint' documents.  Functions are provided to let users create tables, modify and format their content.  It extends package 'officer' that does not contain any feature for customized tabular reporting  and can be used within R markdown documents.
# License: GPL-3
# LazyData: TRUE
# Imports: stats, utils, grDevices, graphics, officer (>= 0.2.0), rmarkdown, knitr, htmltools, xml2, data.table, gdtools (>= 0.1.6), rlang, base64enc
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Suggests: testthat, xtable, magrittr, webshot, magick, ggplot2
# Encoding: UTF-8
# URL: https://davidgohel.github.io/flextable
# BugReports: https://github.com/davidgohel/flextable/issues
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-06-25 08:46:29 UTC; davidgohel
# Author: David Gohel [aut, cre], Quentin Fazilleau [ctb], Maxim Nazarov [ctb] (rmarkdown for docx output), Titouan Robert [ctb]
# Maintainer: David Gohel <david.gohel@ardata.fr>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-06-25 09:20:03 UTC
